tooltips.password: Optional. If provided, a ChatwootUser will be created with these credentials so the agent can login to Chatwoot immediately. Requirements: minimum 6 characters and at least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}). If not provided, the agent will receive a confirmation email to set their password.
tooltips.chatwootAgentId: The agent ID in Chatwoot. This field is automatically populated after sync.
tooltips.autoOffline: Whether the agent's availability status is configured to go offline automatically when away.
tooltips.confirmed: Whether the agent has confirmed their email address in Chatwoot.
tooltips.chatwootUser: Link to the platform-level Chatwoot User if this agent corresponds to one.
tooltips.customRoleId: The custom role ID assigned to this agent in Chatwoot, if any.
